name: Tristone Capital
overview: Tristone Capital is a global energy advisory firm that provides fully integrated Investment Banking, Acquisitions & Divestitures, and Global Equity Capital Markets services. Since its inception in 2000, Tristone Capital has expanded its global reach with offices in the UK, Argentina, Canada and the US. Tristone Capital offers exclusively energy-focused expertise to exploration and production companies, oilfield service and midstream companies, government entities, royalty trusts, MLPâ€™s, and institutional investors worldwide.
